Articles.Content:
Where can i find that mod that make you able to add two planes/rockets/rovers together, like if you make a rover in the spaceplane hangar and the rocket in the other one.

Edited June 12, 2013 by rowns
You mean the Subassembly Loader? Make sure you get the 0.20 plugin fix for it here. It is not compatible with the new 0.20 system, so install it like you would with 0.19 mods.

You mean the Subassembly Loader? Make sure you get the 0.20 plugin fix for it here. It is not compatible with the new 0.20 system, so install it like you would with 0.19 mods.

Hi thank you that did solve the problem it.
I have another question when i try to save something i get a message that says something with nodes and that it cant be saved, somebody knows what it mean because i dont.

That means there isn't any free attachment nodes (green ball markers) on the subassembly you are trying to save. You can't just save anything sadly, there needs to be at least one attachment node to make it work.

Example: If you want to save your heavy asparagus lifter, if you just drag it off from your craft by the top decoupler, there will be a green ball on the decoupler where it was attached to the craft, meaning you could save this. However, if you were to try saving only one of the asparagus boosters by selecting it's radial decoupler, it wouldn't work because those don't have any attachment nodes.

I hope it's not too unclear :l
